Description of incident: "The OurMine hacking collective broke into the servers of music video hosting service Vevo and on late Thursday posted approximately 3.12 terabytes of stolen documents and data on its website, in an unusually aggressive attack by the group.Normally, OurMine is known for accessing celebrities' or companies' social media accounts and defacing their corresponding pages. In such circumstances, the group typically claims to be testing victims' security and offers to help improve their defenses. But the data dump constitutes a more serious infraction, as it involves the posting of private documents."
